question: Which title did the Sai Praneeth won recently?
explanation: Indian shuttler B Sai Praneeth won the men's singles title at the Thailand Open Grand Prix Title by posting a come-from-behind victory over Indonesian Jonatan Christie in the men's singles final of the USD 1,20,000 Thailand. This is Praneeth's second consecutive title win, following the Singapore Open victory. He had reached the finals of Syed Modi International in January at Hyderabad, where he lost to Sameer Verma.
